manual¶

  • running Xopt
  • parallel
  • constraints & restraints

I sincerely hope you find the program or parts of it useful. It is published under a GNU license and allows code re-use and sharing as long as credits are given.

Much of the development has been done in my free time and I learned a lot with this project. If you find bugs or have suggestions please write to me or open an issue on github.

How to cite¶

For proper technical documentation cite the git version, github repository and authors, e.g.:

H.Kruse, https://github.com/hokru/xopt, version v2.0b-1-g7434
